* Child
* div>ul>li

* Sibling
* div+p+bq

* Climb up
* div>ul>li>^p

* Multiplication
* ul>li*5

* Multiplication work it out itself
* ul>li*

* Grouping
* div>main>(ul>li*2>a)^footer>p

* Attribute operators
* ID
* div#header
* Class
* div.page
* td[title="Hello World"]

* Item numbering
* ul>li#item$*5
* ul>li#item$$$*5

* Change numbering base and direction
* ul>li#item$@-3*5

* Text Embed
* a{Hello World}
* p>{Click }+a{here}+{ to continue}

* Lorem generator
* lorem

* Implicit tags
* .class = div
* em>.class = em span
* ul>.class*3 = ul li
* table>#row$*4#data$*4 = table td

* Balance inward
* <emmet>d

* Balance Outward
* <emmet>D

* next edit point
* <emmet>n

* Prev edit point
* <emmet>N
* Works only in normal mode

* Merge to one line
* <emmet>m

* Remove tag
* <emmet>k

* Split join tag
* <emmet>j

* Toggle comment
* <emmet>/

* make anchor from url
* <emmet>a

* Quoted text from url
* <emmet>A
